headline: TTWO Q2 Deep Dive: Mobile Outperformance and Franchise Momentum Offset Guidance Concerns
summary: Video game publisher Take Two (NASDAQ:TTWO) reported Q2 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 12.4% year on year to $1.50 billion. Revenue guidance for the full year exceeded analysts’ estimates, but next quarter’s guidance of $1.68 billion was less impressive, coming in 1.2% below expectations. Its GAAP loss of $0.07 per share was 90.2% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
